I want this title to also show gratitude to all the women who have elevated me to be who I am today.

10.07.2020 18:36 - Hakan Amcam: In 2015-2016 Timothy and his wife were faced with a difficult point in their life. His wife recognized that there was something wrong but didnâ€™t know how to convey the message to Timothy about his situation. Over time she began to see the signs that he was suffering mentally and emotionally and began to push for him to seek help. Because of this, it meant he would need to take time off work and focus on himself to get better. However, he was reluctant because he was afraid to be labelled as â€œjust quitting or taking advantage of short term leave.â€ After several discussions and some very hard pushing, she convinced him to take time off and get the help he needed.

After six months of hard work and self-discovery, they discovered that he suffered from a major depressive disorder. Now it meant he would need to open up to a stranger and ultimately take medication to improve the situation. Though Timothy was not a fan of this, he realized that through discussion with his wife and his soon to be son, that this was the only option. Fast forward to late 2019, Timothy again began to suffer and didnâ€™t know what to do; however, this time, he had the tools, resources, and knowledge to be able to navigate the web and was able to recover.

At that point, he realized that all of these experiences cost a lot of time, effort, but most importantly, money and many people do not have that luxury. .â€ In 2020 he started an organization called the Serendipity Group, an NFP organization. Designed to help individuals and their families seek the treatment they need and not to be concerned with the cost of therapy. Making a difference within his community is extremely important and personal to him.
â€œWe often think of Charity As an Action. But Charity means making a difference saving one individual at a time.â€
No alt text provided for this image

Serendipity Group is a Not for Profit organization designed to help individuals and their families who suffer from Mental Health. Our focus is to assist those who otherwise cannot afford these services. Our organization also focuses on providing workshops & seminars to help couples, families, and individuals who wish to learn more in regards to Financial Literacy.

Giving to those who may not be aware they need help can mean the start of whole new beginnings for them and their family. Various versions of mental health have evolved over the last decade. It is our hope with all the research and tools out there that we can utilize them to help navigate the web of mental health for our clients.

Timothy Laflamme is married with two beautiful children and two golden doodles. He enjoys playing with his children, video games, watching videos and playing sports. Timothy is very passionate about helping individuals, families, and businesses reach their vision and goals. He is also passionate about education, leading by example, and most importantly, ensuring people can achieve success in whatever they are trying to do.
No alt text provided for this image

He has over 15 years of corporate finance and banking experience both in Canada and the United States. His expertise includes several areas that cross from AML, Banking, Financial Planning and Risk Assessment. He also a vast amount of experience in working with small to medium-sized businesses helping them to identify their vision, mission, and goals to be successful.

Timothy has a passion for teaching financial literacy and has taught and helped several individuals, families, and businesses get on the right track of success for their future. This desire came from a quick realization that we, as Canadians, have not been taught about the importance of being financially literate and knew this was a MUST function for life. He also enjoys public speaking, organizing events, and educating anyone who needs help.

As an entrepreneur, he continues to enjoy building new experiences and forming long-lasting relationships. He has led several companies, both successful and not successful in his career. However, with his expertise, this has helped several entrepreneurs, to the path of success.
